main_definition: Houston is a common nickname or informal reference to the city of Houston, Texas, and can also be an idiomatic expression indicating readiness or preparedness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A nickname for the city of Houston, Texas
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm planning a road trip to see the Space Center in Houston.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be ready or prepared (referring back to NASA and its historical launch site)
meanings_and_examples.example: The team is all set and houston on their big presentation tomorrow.
